ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

This browser extension and script unlocks ChatGPT's internal product search API, allowing users to fetch detailed product information, reviews, and comparisons directly within the ChatGPT interface. It provides a user-friendly modal for searching and comparing products, with features like search history and sentiment analysis.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Pik is an interactive command-line tool for finding and terminating processes on Linux, macOS, and Windows. It offers fuzzy searching capabilities based on process name, command path, arguments, ports, or a combination of these, providing a more user-friendly alternative to the standard `pkill` command.

Katakate (k7) provides a self-hosted infrastructure for creating and managing lightweight, secure virtual machine sandboxes. It's designed to safely execute untrusted code at scale, leveraging technologies like Kata, Firecracker, and Kubernetes, and is suitable for AI compute, custom serverless, and hardened CI/CD runners.
